description: This source file contains functions to generate JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enums, and stubs based on a schema definition. It includes logic to parse schema, conditionally generate code files, and handle file modification checks.

classes.name: JsonRpcSchema
classes.description: Represents the JSON-RPC schema derived from the input schema, capturing the class name and schema details

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API, including necessary includes and boilerplate comments

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to parse the schema, generate classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code based on provided flags

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
